name: Fractured Pairs and Trios Online Quiz | Fractured Words | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
milk and honey.

	The land of milk and honey is Heaven, or maybe Eden.

Jack and Jill.

	They went uphill to fetch a pail of water, with unfortunate results.

night and day.

	Dei means "God" in Latin.

questions and answers.

	The sun dance is an important Plains Indian ritual--and the name of a U.S. film festival.

questions.correct: bread and butter & bread and water
questions.explanation:
bread and butter & bread and water.

	I earn mine by writing K-12 textbooks.

red white and blue.

	Baloo is a bear in "The Jungle Book." In the Disney film, he sings about the "simple bear necessities."

sugar and spice.

	Along with everything nice, that's what little girls are made of.

ups and downs.

	The old rollercoaster of life.

before and after.

	This is also a book and a movie title (the book is better, if you ask me).

Will and Grace.

	A much-loved U.S. TV show about a gay man and a straight woman who are best friends.

War and Peace.

	By the great Leo Tolstoy.

Sense and Sensibility.

	By the lovely and talented Jane Austen. The movie starred Emma Thompson and Kate Winslet.

wine and cheese.

	They always serve this at art show openings and poetry readings held at universities.

gold and silver.

	A sylph is an air spirit or a slender girl.

Tom Dick and Harry.

	These were the names of the three tunnels in "The Great Escape," my favorite war movie. (Take spanishliz's quizzes on this film--they're fabulous.)

please and thank you.

	These are the "two little magic words that will open any door with ease. One little word is THANKS and the other little word is PLEASE!"

cream and sugar.

	Kareem Abdul-Jabbar is a famous U.S. basketball player.

Tea and Sympathy.

	A movie in which a married woman befriends a schoolboy who is presumeably gay.

questions.text: Sun hips sins nails sun plucky docks tales?
questions.correct: snips and snails and puppy dog tails&snips and snails and puppy dogs tails & snaps and snails and puppy dog tails
questions.explanation:
snips and snails and puppy dog tails&snips and snails and puppy dogs tails & snaps and snails and puppy dog tails.

	That's what little boys are made of.

kiss and make up.

	What dear friends should do after they argue.

questions.text: Island pfennig her? (Pretend that you have an Irish accent--unless you DO have one, which is even better.)
questions.explanation:
oil and vinegar.

	I like olive oil and raspberry vinegar. My salad dressing also contains: crushed garlic, red onions sliced thin, capers, honey, country-style mustard, basil, chopped apple, and pepper.

rise and shine.

	...and sing out your glory, glory!

the birds and the bees.

	Parents think they have to inform their children about this concept, but most kids find out from friends, I believe.

questions.text: Be knot bought her Aunt Shelley?
questions.explanation:
peanut butter and jelly.

	Children's favorite sandwich ingredients.

questions.text: Thee acne Andy heck stuff he?
questions.explanation:
The Agony and the Ecstasy.

	Irving Stone's biography of Michelangelo Buonarotti.
